header: The Second Message:The Glory of This House

verse: On the twenty-first day of the seventh month, the word of the Lord came through Haggai the prophet.

header: The Third Set of Messages:The Transfer of Cleanness and Uncleanness

verse: On the twenty-fourth day of the ninth month in the second year of Darius, the word of the Lord came to Haggai the prophet.
